meanings.definition: A loud cry or shout to attract attention.
meanings.sent1: The hikers let out holloos when they saw the bear.
meanings.sent2: I heard holloos coming from the football stadium.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's holloos for silence were always ignored by the rowdy students.
meanings.sent4: The holloos of the protesters echoed through the streets.
meanings.sent5: The holloos of the lifeguard saved the drowning swimmer.

meanings.sent1: She holloos for her dog when it runs away.
meanings.sent2: The coach holloos instructions to the players during the game.
meanings.sent3: The children holloos with excitement when they see the ice cream truck.
meanings.sent4: He holloos across the field to get his friend's attention.
meanings.sent5: The farmer holloos to gather his sheep for feeding.
